SRC Package

Submodules

src.driver module

At run time, this script looks for a given module, loads it, and executes a ‘main’ function with given parameters.

Example: spark-submit –py-files package.whl driver.py main_module [ARGS]

driver.run(main, local)

Executes the main module loaded.

src.main module

Defines the ETLPipeline main entry point.

main.run(local)

The main.py script entry point to run the ETLPipeline.

Parameters

local – If True uses the AWS EMR and S3 configurations, otherwise uses the local file system and the localhost Spark session.
